name: E-Debian GNU/Linux
short_description:
Description

A Debian distribution,which goal is to be user-friendly and ease of use.

E-Debian default desktop environment is GNOME3.
Other window managers included LXDE,GNOME Classic,Openbox
It comes with the most common wireless drivers and Synaptic Package Manager, XBMC,Wine, Virtual Box and much more.

Comes with PlayOnLinux; a front-end GUI for Wine so that users can install some Windows programs on GNU/Linux.
PlayOnLinux is found in the Games section of the menu.

Based on Debian 7.

To install the operation system go to "System Tools" in the menu and select "Live Install" and follow the on-screen windows instructions.

To update packages type the following in the Terminal:

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade

To upgrade distribution:

sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade

Build Version: Debian 7.7 3.20-pae-686
Debian 7.7 Remastered

The Lite version of E-Debian can be found here:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/edebianlite
summary: A Debian distribution,which goal is to be user-friendly.
